TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 中存储的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects stored in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储 对象，这些对象表示控件中的父级的子项 。A stores objects that represent subitems of a parent in the control. 如果在控件的属性中指定了列 ，并且将 控件的属性 设置为 ，则子项只显示在控件中。Subitems are only displayed in a control when columns are specified in the property of the control and when the property of the control is set to . 中的子项顺序决定了 子项在控件中显示的列 。The order of subitems in the determines the columns the subitems are displayed in the control. 可以通过多种方式将子项添加到集合中。There are a number of ways to add subitems to the collection. 方法将单个添加 到集合中。The method adds a single to the collection. 若要将许多子项添加到集合中，请创建一个对象数组 ，并将其传递给 方法。To add a number of subitems to the collection, you create an array of objects and pass it to the method. 如果要在集合中的特定位置插入子项，可以使用 方法。If you want to insert a subitem at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除子项，你可以使用 方法或方法（ 如果你知道子项在集合中的位置）。To remove subitems, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the subitem is located in the collection. 方法使你可以从集合中移除所有子项，而不是使用 方法一次删除单个子项。The method enables you to remove all subitems from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single subitem at a time. 除了用于添加和移除子项的方法和属性外， 还提供用于在集合中查找子项的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing subitems, the also provides methods to find subitems in the collection. 使用 方法可以确定是否 为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection. 了解子项位于集合中后，可以使用 方法来确定子项在集合中的位置。Once you know that the subitem is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the subitem is located in the collection.

summary.span: 将子项添加到子项的集合中。

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection of subitems.

Public Function Add (text As String) As ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem

param.name: text
param.span: 要为该子项显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the subitem.

summary.span: 将子项添加到具有指定文本的集合。

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection with specified text.
The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的 方法允许您通过指定子项的文本将子项添加到集合中。This version of the method allows you to add a subitem to the collection by specifying the text of the subitem. 调用此方法时，将 使用指定的文本创建一个新的。When this method is called, a new is created with the specified text. 然后，你可以使用 此方法返回的来设置属性，并调用方法来处理该子项。You can then use the that is returned by this method to set properties and call methods to manipulate the subitem. 如果你已经有想要 添加到集合中的现有，则可以使用 接受作为参数的方法的版本 ，或者 如果想要在集合中的特定位置添加子项，则使用方法。If you already have an existing that you want to add to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts a as a parameter, or use the method if you want to add the subitem at a specific position within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例要求您已将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在此示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将现有的 添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds an existing to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的 方法将现有添加 到集合中。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 此方法通常用于重用其他对象中的现有子项 。This method is typically used to reuse existing subitems from other objects. 添加到集合的项将插入到列表的末尾。Items that are added to the collection are inserted at the end of the list. 若要将某个项插入到集合中的特定位置，请使用 方法。To insert an item into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 如果要添加现有对象的数组 ，则可以使用 接受对象数组作为参数的方法的版本 。If you want to add an array of existing objects, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter.

summary.span: 将子项添加到具有指定文本、前景色、背景色和字体设置的集合。

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection with specified text, foreground color, background color, and font settings.
The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的 方法允许您通过指定子项的文本将子项添加到集合中。This version of the method allows you to add a subitem to the collection by specifying the text of the subitem. 此外，此版本的 方法允许您指定子项文本的初始前景色、背景色和字体。In addition, this version of the method allows you to specify the initial foreground color, background color, and font of the subitem text. 调用此方法时，将 使用指定的文本创建一个新的。When this method is called, a new is created with the specified text. 然后，你可以使用 此方法返回的来设置属性，并调用方法来处理该子项。You can then use the that is returned by this method to set properties and call methods to manipulate the subitem. 如果你已经有想要 添加到集合中的现有，则可以使用 接受作为参数的方法的版本 ，或者 如果你想要将子项添加到集合中的特定位置，请使用方法。If you already have an existing that you want to add to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts a as a parameter, or use the method if you want to add the subitem at a specific position in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，子项使用为父项指定的前景色、背景色和字体。By default, subitems use the foreground color, background color, and font specified for the parent item. 将 属性设置为， `false` 以防止父项样式覆盖子项样式。Set the property to `false` to prevent the parent item styles from overriding the subitem styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的 方法向集合中添加字符串数组，其中集合中的每个字符串表示新子项的文本。You can use this version of the method to add an array of strings to the collection, where each string in the collection represents the text of a new subitem. 您可以使用 接受字符串数组作为参数的方法的另一个版本，以便为要添加的每个项指定前景色、背景色和字体。You can use the other version of the method that accepts an array of strings as a parameter to specify the foreground color, background color, and font for each item being added. 如果要重复使用现有 对象并将其添加到集合中，则可以使用 接受对象数组作为参数的方法版本 。If you want to reuse existing objects and add them to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter. 如果要添加单个 ，请使用 方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 如果要在 集合中的特定位置添加单个，还可以使用方法。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此版本的 方法向集合中添加字符串数组，其中集合中的每个字符串表示新子项的文本。You can use this version of the method to add an array of strings to the collection, where each string in the collection represents the text of a new subitem. 此外，此版本的 方法允许您为每个子项指定前景色、背景色和字体。In addition, this version of the method allows you to specify the foreground color, background color, and font for each subitem. 如果您不希望为每个子项指定前景色、背景色和字体设置，则可以使用接受字符串数组作为参数的其他版本的方法。You can use the other version of the method that accepts an array of strings as a parameter if you do not want to specify foreground color, background color, and font settings for each subitem. 如果要重复使用现有 对象并将其添加到集合中，则可以使用 接受对象数组作为参数的方法版本 。If you want to reuse existing objects and add them to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter. 如果要添加单个 ，请使用 方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 如果要在 集合中的特定位置添加单个，还可以使用方法。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，子项使用为父项指定的前景色、背景色和字体。By default, subitems use the foreground color, background color, and font specified for the parent item. 将 属性设置为， `false` 以防止父项样式覆盖子项样式。Set the property to `false` to prevent the parent item styles from overriding the subitem styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集合中删除子项时，集合中的后续子项的索引会发生更改。When you remove a subitem from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent subitems in the collection. 删除的子项的所有信息都将被删除。All information about the removed subitem is deleted. 通过指定要从集合中移除的子项的索引，可以使用此方法从集合中移除特定的子项。You can use this method to remove a specific subitem from the collection by specifying the index of the subitem to remove from the collection. 若要指定要删除的子项而不是子项的索引，请使用 方法。To specify the subitem to remove instead of the index to the subitem, use the method. 若要从集合中删除所有子项，请使用 方法。To remove all subitems from the collection, use the method.
